short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit, save, seach and download notes related to LinkedIn profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linked Notes is designed to enhance your LinkedIn browsing experience by allowing you to save personal notes directly to individual LinkedIn profiles. Whether you’re conducting research, tracking professional interactions, or simply keeping important details about contacts, Linked Notes helps you easily manage and retrieve this information in an organized manner through your browser.

When you view a LinkedIn profile, Linked Notes allows you to:
- Add, edit, and save personal notes directly from the popup window.
- Search your notes and download profile information into CSV files.
- Copy profile details to your clipboard for easy sharing or further reference.
- Search Google for more information about the contact with a simple click.

Your personal notes are securely stored using Chrome’s Sync Storage, ensuring that the data is only accessible by you and synced across your Chrome devices. This means your notes are not stored on external servers or shared with third parties. Chrome’s sync storage encrypts your data to protect it from unauthorized access, providing an additional layer of security for your personal information.

Linked Notes is a simply and efficient way to manage your professional connections in a secure and private environment.

@LINKED_NOTES
